text:
home. Note I saw a camera connect Monday around 3:00 PM as mentioned, so am not sure what's going on, but I notified you the moment I saw it
for full disclosure and recommend you disconnect the camera. I would also be happy to show you how to (1) verify there is no monitoring via the
Xfinity network tools, and (2) change the network password to ensure your safety. I’m also available to help with any technical questions related to
this or data we have consented to share with service providers or one another. I want to be sure to alleviate your concerns. I am truly sorry this
happened and will be of service in any way I can moving forward to put you at ease.
-robert
Message 459 of 4024
This needs to be sent via lawyers.
I will change cell phone plans for boys and I and please send details for how to change Xfinity’s password. I will remove you as authorized account
user.
Sent:01/17/2024 at 07:41 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/17/2024 at 07:45 AM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg
Message 460 of 4024
You only need to change the phone plan for you. We have an amazing rate and moving the kids to a new plan will cost a fortune. More than happy to
discuss details of what needs to happen so you can severe legacy data access you agreed to. I don’t want any confusion about this and as noted, want to
help.
Please unblock me. We have rules and I have been following them. I will continue to observe those.
Sent:01/17/2024 at 07:50 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/17/2024 at 07:51 AM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg
Message 461 of 4024
I just can’t continue the communication with you in that way.
I’m going to give it a break and stick with OFW  and perhaps revisit at a later date.
I’m going into work mode.
I  connecting with my lawyer today to confirm our next steps. To date we have seen nothing from your lawyer since Sunday. That’s it for me.
Sent:01/17/2024 at 07:54 AM
From:Christine Moyer
To:Robert Moyer (First Viewed: 01/17/2024 at 07:57 AM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg
Message 462 of 4024
Good luck today. I’ll obviously be limited in my ability to communicate given disaster clean up. I’ll also try to multi task and help is pack up things.
Sent:01/17/2024 at 08:30 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/17/2024 at 08:38 AM)
Subject:Re: Monday lugg
